H0.text: What is the American word for a short-hand typist. Stenographer

H1.text: What is the American word for a short-hand typist. Typist

H2.text: What is the American word for a short-hand typist. Secretary

H3.text: What is the American word for a short-hand typist. Shorthand

A4.text: Shorthand is an abbreviated symbolic writing method that increases speed and brevity of writing as compared to longhand, a more common method of writing a language.

A5.text: The process of writing in shorthand is called stenography, from the Greek stenos (narrow) and graphein (to write).

A6.text: Keyscript Shorthand is available at keyscriptshorthand.com

A7.text: Media related to Shorthand can be found on Wikimedia Commons

A8.text: Keyscript Shorthand is available at keyscriptshorthand2.website3.me

A9.text: The Louis A. Leslie Collection of Historical Shorthand Materials at Rider University â€“ materials for download

A10.text: A court reporter, court stenographer, or shorthand reporter is a person whose occupation is to capture the live testimony in proceedings using a stenographic machine or a stenomask.

A11.text: The training on a stenograph machine requires the person to pass writing speed tests of up to 225 words a minute on their machine in the United States, as set forth by the National Court Reporters Association (NCRA).
